text: Globoplay is a Brazilian subscription video on demand service owned by Grupo Globo. The service offers original shows, content newly aired on Grupo Globo's broadcast properties, and content from Rede Globo's library, along with live streams of the local Rede Globo affiliate's main channel, where available. ==Original programming== ===Drama=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !
